document.full_text: india's parliament erupted in outrage on thursday over a report that described bribes to secure passage of a 2008 vote on a nuclear deal between india and the united states.
document.title: in india, leaked cable about bribes sets off a furor
lines_and_colors: india's parliament erupted in outrage on thursday over a report that described bribes to secure passage of a 2008 vote on a nuclear deal between india and the united states.
